name: Army War Truck Driving
description:
Army War Truck Driving has stunning graphics & HD environment with breathtaking visuals. Military cargo truck commando transporter games have real-time physics simulation based controls of the helicopters &vehicles. There are multiple challenging & adventuring military survival missions in the off road us army transport sim. Drive the powerful military truck carefully on the different twisted tracks & mountain terrains to save the commandos. Avoid bumping and crashing; follow the map and drive as highway truck driver. Feel free to drive a real us army transport like as pro transporter. Simulate the military helicopter, go to the base camp where oil tanker has been a blast and save the gorilla commandos. Save commandos to clear the level and unlock more levels.

Features:
• Realistic and addictive 3d graphics
• Multiple rescue missions
• Awesome realistic animations
• Easy game play
• Good sound effect
• Multiple camera views
